Clearwater Lake’s Outdoor Adventure

03 Oct 2012

What would you say if I told you that you could go portaging with your motor boat? You would probably think I’m crazy. After all, who wants to pick up a heavy motor boat and carry it around? Well, according to Clearwater Lodge at Clearwater Lake, their mechanical “roller coaster” system allows you to gain access to the entire lake system in one easy trip:

“It’s the mechanical portages that make this lake system what it is, giving the unparalleled access to the entire lake chain. It’s definitely what makes this lake system unique. As far as we know there is no other lake system that provides this type of mechanical portaging any where else in Ontario.”

The system was put into place so you can choose wherever you would like to go and fish to your heart’s content. To the south you’ll find Walleye, Muskie, Pike and Bass. To the north you’ve got your Trout.

So if you’ve always wanted to portage sans canoe, then Clearwater Lodge’s Roller Coaster Mechanical Portage is for you!
